title: Marble Age
notes: Slight sound stuttering, but works fine

notes: Splash screen shows up but then error message "DX11 feature level 10.0 is required.."

title: Redout: Enhanced Edition
notes: Gyro controls with the Steam controller also work

title: Redout: Enhanced Edition
notes: It runs with "PROTON_NO_D3D11=1 %command%" launch option, but there are graphic glitches

title: Redout: Enhanced Edition
notes: Minor graphical glitches on startup, seem to smooth out afterwards.

title: Redout: Enhanced Edition
notes: Game runs great, except for the volcano levels dropping down to single digit framerates when lava and smoke are on screen.

title: Redout: Enhanced Edition
notes: Games starts and menus run with minimal stutters.  Once in race, frame rate drops to single digits.  Game freezes if high graphical presets selected.

title: Redout: Enhanced Edition
notes: No graphical glitches and performance is like native, no launch options were needed. But in the games settings you have to disable vsync and set FPS to unlimited, otherwise you get stuttering framerate/freezes.

title: Redout: Enhanced Edition
notes: Disabled Steam Overlay in-game. Game runs without any problem on EPIC, frame rates are low when encountering sandstorms etc.

title: Redout: Enhanced Edition
notes: Lags normally on play / None / Shadows and texture multipliers down and it should work flawlessly then.
works fine...only 3440x1440 not possible, window mode 1920x1200 works fine
title: Redout: Enhanced Edition

notes: Tried 2 tracks time trial, worked perfectly with 60fps on max settings. Didn't test VR though
title: Redout: Enhanced Edition

notes: Only playable on minimum settings. On Windows on the same machine it can maintain 1080p60 on High settings.
title: Redout: Enhanced Edition

cpu: AMD Ryzen 5 2400G with Radeon Vega Graphics
notes: Much better performance with the latest Proton update. However it freezes sometimes when you run a new track for the first time, but just after one lap the issue disappears. No issue with low settings.
title: Redout: Enhanced Edition

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX Vega (VEGA10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.12-1-MANJARO, LLVM 7.0.0)
notes: The first race stutters for the first few seconds. After hat it runs great on max settings. Only runs in 1920x1080 in windowed mode. (Had to put -windowed as start option on first launch)
title: Redout: Enhanced Edition

notes: Being a UE4 game it suffers the NVAPI hell bug on NVIDIA cards. simulating a fake amd card on dxvk.conf helps but doesn't solve entirely the slowliness (ex. martian circuits are speedy as 50-60fps, calima is unplayable at 0-12 fps)
title: Redout: Enhanced Edition
